lawReminder.title: Legal Requirements
lawReminder.content: Article 47 of Law No. 2005-102 of February 11, 2005, on equal rights and opportunities, participation, and citizenship of people with disabilities, makes accessibility a requirement for all online public communication services of the State, local authorities, and public institutions that depend on them. It stipulates that information disseminated by these services must be accessible to all.

rgaaCompliance.title: RGAA Compliance Statement
rgaaCompliance.content:
The University of Paul-Valéry Montpellier 3 strives to comply with the main criteria for making its site accessible (General Accessibility Improvement Repository - RGAA recommendations). However, as there is no current valid audit result to measure compliance with RGAA criteria, the site puppetplays.eu is declared non-compliant.
Learn more about RGAA requirements
